title: One of the best meteor showers of the year peaks at the worst possible time this week
description: A daylight peak and a full moon combine to sabotage the powerful Quadrantid meteor shower in 2026.
content: A daylight peak and a full moon combine to sabotage the powerful Quadrantid meteor shower in 2026.
